sentences.english: He didn't pretend to be aloof to despise the girl in whorehouse .
sentences.chinese: 他也不会故做清高，拾青楼女子于不顾。

sentences.english: The woman is thirty years old, this is the most attractive rose, the age of maturity and charming.
sentences.chinese: 女忍叁拾岁湜玫瑰，哲湜最犹魅力得年龄，成熟迷忍。

sentences.english: Mortuary later picked up 40 people survived Gai, also a Canadian and bandit buried in tombs edge.
sentences.chinese: 后人殓拾40人遗赅时，亦一并将强盗尸首葬于墓边。

sentences.english: He picked up a watch at the school gate.
sentences.chinese: 他在学校门口拾到一块手表。

sentences.english: It is like picking up a turquoise of whitish luster.
sentences.chinese: 犹如拾了一块白光的松石。

sentences.english: Demanded the return of property and return money found plenty of traditional moral contradiction?
sentences.chinese: 拾到财物索要回报与拾金不昧的传统道德相矛盾？

sentences.english: Go clamming is also a dangerous work with a willy-willy(typhoon) .
sentences.chinese: 在台风天的拾蛤蜊也是份危险的工作。

sentences.english: When the tide ebbed, they scattered to pick sea shells.
sentences.chinese: 退潮之后，他们就四处去拾贝壳。

sentences.english: Monkey Tom picked up a little straw hat.
sentences.chinese: 小猴汤姆拾到一顶小草帽。

sentences.english: Kemuel son of Shiphtan, the leader from the tribe of Ephraim son of Joseph;
sentences.chinese: 以法莲支派有一个首领，拾弗但的儿子基母利。

sentences.english: It’s trash for cash in the Russian Capital City of Moscow.
sentences.chinese: 拾空酒瓶在俄罗斯首都莫斯科是将垃圾挣钱的方式。

sentences.english: He cautiously picked up the nails.
sentences.chinese: 他小心地把钉子拾了起来。

sentences.english: He picked up a wallet in the street and gave it to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 他在街上拾到一个钱包，把它交给了警察。

sentences.english: He picked up a wallet in the street and gave it to a policeman.
sentences.chinese: 他在街上拾到一个钱包，把它铰给了警察。

sentences.english: I try to get horse hockey for my garden.
sentences.chinese: 我要去拾马粪给我的园子施肥。
